wikipedia_page.main: Aaron Joseph McGowan is an English professional footballer who plays as a right-back for Northampton Town. He has previously played for Kilmarnock, Morecambe and Hamilton Academical.

link_mentions.page: List of Hamilton Academical F.C. players

response: Hawley graduated through the Morecambe Academy to make his first-team debut on 1 April 2017, coming on as an 86th-minute substitute for Aaron McGowan in a 3–1 defeat at Cheltenham Town.
